long_description: Wall map of Nevada features gradation coloring representing changes in altitude and three-dimensional shading for relief. Topographic map, scale to 1:2,500,000, contour intervals are 500 feet, and in color to easily notice difference in elevations. Raven Maps and Images; copyright 1989. Measures 63x36 inches. Although there is amazing detail, the map remains completely uncluttered when viewed from more than a few feet away. Whether displayed in a home, school or office, these maps are sure to attract attention.
short_description: Wall map of Nevada features gradation coloring representing changes in altitude and three-dimensional shading for relief.
